methods.name: void connectionClosed(ConnectionEvent event)
methods.comment: * Notifies this ConnectionEventListener that * the application has called the method close on its * representation of a pooled connection. * * @param event an event object describing the source of * the event

methods.name: void connectionErrorOccurred(ConnectionEvent event)
methods.comment: * Notifies this ConnectionEventListener that * a fatal error has occurred and the pooled connection can * no longer be used. The driver makes this notification just * before it throws the application the SQLException * contained in the given ConnectionEvent object. * * @param event an event object describing the source of * the event and containing the SQLException that the * driver is about to throw
